Original: The client is... Well, do you see the
one wearing a large mask? With the
many animals at his side...?
[Page]
He is an animal tamer. I told him that
monsters are not allowed here, but he
insists they are his friends.
[Page]
It is putting the other patrons off
as well. Can you go talk to him?
[Page]
I am counting on you, [Guild]
Guild. I shall await your swift
return...
Translation: The client is... Well, do you see the
one wearing a large mask? With the
many animals at his side...?
[Page]
He is an animal tamer. I told him that
monsters are not allowed here, but he
insists they are his friends.
[Page]
It is putting the other patrons off
as well. Can you go talk to him?
[Page]
I am counting on you, [Guild]
Guild. I shall await your swift
return...

Original: Welcome back. It seemed to be a
simple misunderstanding... but the
animal tamer's request is complete.
[Page]
His monsters were very well behaved
while he waited for you. They really
do obey him.
[Page]
They were more courteous than some of
the drunkards we get. But... ugh...
My establishment smells of animals.
[Page]
No more monsters in here! Oh, look
at that! A request to clean this
establishment is about to be posted!
Translation: Welcome back. It seemed to be a
simple misunderstanding... but the
animal tamer's request is complete.
[Page]
His monsters were very well behaved
while he waited for you. They really
do obey him.
[Page]
They were more courteous than some of
the drunkards we get. But... ugh...
My establishment smells of animals.
[Page]
No more monsters in here! Oh, look
at that! A request to clean this
establishment is about to be posted!

Original: You do as your client suggested and
throw the food into the tornado!
[Page]
There is an immediate reaction as a
bloodcurdling roar thunders!
[Page]
You shake to behold an enormous lion,
lured by the scent of food on the
wind, and now charging at you!
[Page]
If that is the lion queen the client
spoke of, it will be impossible to
subdue in its current state!
[Page]
You must decide now whether to face
the beast or run from it!
Translation: You do as your client suggested and
throw the food into the tornado!
[Page]
There is an immediate reaction as a
bloodcurdling roar thunders!
[Page]
You shake to behold an enormous lion,
lured by the scent of food on the
wind, and now charging at you!
[Page]
If that is the lion queen the client
spoke of, it will be impossible to
subdue in its current state!
[Page]
You must decide now whether to face
the beast or run from it!

Original: [Color:5]Confront the monster?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Confront the monster?[Color:0]

Original: You valiantly draw your weapons and
stand firm against the charging
monster!
Translation: You valiantly draw your weapons and
stand firm against the charging
monster!

Original: Sensing grave danger, you elect to
retreat for now and rush into your
skyship!
Translation: Sensing grave danger, you elect to
retreat for now and rush into your
skyship!

Original: With your final strike, the monster
collapses and eventually stops moving
altogether.
[Page]
This is unfortunate... Though you were
left with no choice, you have slain
the client's animal friend!
[Page]
Still, what's done is done. You must
report the truth of what happened
to him.
[Page]
You give the deceased lion a careful
burial and return to the bar with
heavy steps...
Translation: With your final strike, the monster
collapses and eventually stops moving
altogether.
[Page]
This is unfortunate... Though you were
left with no choice, you have slain
the client's animal friend!
[Page]
Still, what's done is done. You must
report the truth of what happened
to him.
[Page]
You give the deceased lion a careful
burial and return to the bar with
heavy steps...

Original: The scent of food hangs in the air,
but there seem to be no monsters
nearby now...
Translation: The scent of food hangs in the air,
but there seem to be no monsters
nearby now...
